page.title: 15LIFE STYLES
page.content: I live on the outskirts of a small town called{Halesowen.}Halesowen is in the West Midlands,which is in Central Britain. The nearest coast,which is the West Coast is about 100 miles away.The{West Midlands}is made up of quite a few small towns like Halesowen. The West Midlands used to be alive with industry.Chains, nails and anchors were made here.Now we have engineering and{car manufacturing} works. Many people,who live in Halesowen,do not work in town.They travel to places like{Birmingham}and Wolverhampton.Housing is varied.There are semi-detached,detached,flats,bungalows ,maisonettes and cottages. Halesowen lies at the base of the{ {Clent Hills. }
